typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		deptid as string,
		{Department Name} as string,
		{Department Description} as string,
		deptDefSTATid as string,
		deptActive as boolean,
		UpdatedbyId as string,
		UpdatedDate as timestamp,
		deptDefaultModule as string,
		ClientAccess as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select Newid() as deptid\n	, c.ch_description as [Department Name]\n	, c.ch_description as [Department Description]\n	, \'6CA410A9-CD01-495C-B2FF-FD0880F5FA0F\' as deptDefSTATid\n	, CONVERT(Bit, 1) as deptActive\n	, \'DCA6C8B5-BFA7-46D6-9628-41442B22D262\' as UpdatedbyId\n	, dateadd(hh,-6,getdate()) as UpdatedDate\n	, Convert(varchar(80), NULL) as deptDefaultModule\n	, CONVERT(Bit, 0) as ClientAccess\nfrom dbo.channels c where c.ch_type = 7',
	format: 'query') ~> Department
source(output(
		statID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT statID FROM tbkstatus WHERE statname= \'Closing Documents Received (R)\'',
	format: 'query') ~> Status
Department, Status exists(deptDefSTATid == statID,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'none')~> IsDepartmentExists
IsDepartmentExists alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> UpsertValidation
UpsertValidation sink(input(
		deptID as string,
		deptName as string,
		deptDescription as string,
		deptDefSTATid as string,
		deptActive as boolean,
		UpdatedByID as string,
		UpdatedDate as timestamp,
		deptDefaultModule as string,
		ClientAccess as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		deptName = {Department Name},
		deptDescription = {Department Description},
		deptDefSTATid,
		deptActive,
		UpdatedByID = UpdatedbyId,
		UpdatedDate,
		deptDefaultModule,
		ClientAccess
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TagetDepartment
